Docs.summary: Close the connection and stop receiving file upload notifications.
Docs.remarks: The instance can be re-opened after closing.
Docs.exception: If an error occurs when communicating with IoT hub service.
If the provided cancellation token has requested cancellation.
If an error occurs when performing an operation on a WebSocket connection.

Docs.summary: Open the connection and start receiving file upload notifications.
Docs.remarks: Callback for file upload notifications must be set before opening the connection.
Docs.exception: If an error occurs when communicating with IoT hub service.
If the provided cancellation token has requested cancellation.
If an error occurs when performing an operation on a WebSocket connection.
